about_the_game:
本游戏将于2022年12月30日暂时从Steam下架停售，后续将于2023年1月中旬重新发售。非绝版。
暂停发售的原因是要进行公司主体变更。

The cover of the game was authorized by the artist 觉醒.

"End of Panduora" is a fast-paced fantasy-style strategy management game. In a randomly generated corner of the abyss, by consuming sanity in exchange for strength that does not belong to you. In the endless sea, create a new paradise to welcome the remnants of the old gods.

Features

Build a livable community that can meet the needs of the people, and then reject all the refugees who are to be rescued.

How to Play

  • Consume sensible values ​​in exchange for endless energy called "You Neng".
  • "Youneng" can be converted into electrical energy needed to run buildings through power plants.
  • Construct buildings by consuming energy.
  • Produce electricity by consuming electricity to meet people's needs.
  • When the electricity is exhausted, the production building will consume "energy" to maintain production. When "Phantom Energy" is insufficient, it will automatically consume reason to transform into Phantom Energy.
  • Sanity is to be continuously consumed. After satisfying the advanced needs of the people (blue mark), the character can gain a sense of accomplishment and restore the sanity of the character.
  • If the basic needs of the people cannot be met, the sane value will get negative feedback every time period.
  • The character is in anxious state, and only by refusing the refugees can the anxiety value be reduced. The lower the intellect, the faster the anxiety attacks. After the anxiety value is full, it will accelerate the consumption of intellect.

TODO

Add English supports.
Add game sound effects and background music.
Add more buildings and improve game interaction.
detailed_description:
本游戏将于2022年12月30日暂时从Steam下架停售，后续将于2023年1月中旬重新发售。非绝版。
暂停发售的原因是要进行公司主体变更。

The cover of the game was authorized by the artist 觉醒.

"End of Panduora" is a fast-paced fantasy-style strategy management game. In a randomly generated corner of the abyss, by consuming sanity in exchange for strength that does not belong to you. In the endless sea, create a new paradise to welcome the remnants of the old gods.

How to Play

  • Consume sensible values ​​in exchange for endless energy called "You Neng".
  • "Youneng" can be converted into electrical energy needed to run buildings through power plants.
  • Construct buildings by consuming energy.
  • Produce electricity by consuming electricity to meet people's needs.
  • When the electricity is exhausted, the production building will consume "energy" to maintain production. When "Phantom Energy" is insufficient, it will automatically consume reason to transform into Phantom Energy.
  • Sanity is to be continuously consumed. After satisfying the advanced needs of the people (blue mark), the character can gain a sense of accomplishment and restore the sanity of the character.
  • If the basic needs of the people cannot be met, the sane value will get negative feedback every time period.
  • The character is in anxious state, and only by refusing the refugees can the anxiety value be reduced. The lower the intellect, the faster the anxiety attacks. After the anxiety value is full, it will accelerate the consumption of intellect.

name: End of Panduora

subs.option_text: 穷途末路 End of Panduora - $8.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2200G+ or Intel Core 8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or Intel Core 9400f
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX580 8G / GTX 1660ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
